nodes.title: Kontrol Paneli: Her ≈üeyi tek bir yerden takip edin

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio'da Kontrol Paneli, birden fazla hesap ve aƒüda toplanan tokenleriniz, NFT'leriniz ve i≈ülemleriniz ile ilgili olmak √ºzere c√ºzdanlarƒ±nƒ±z hakkƒ±nda i√ßg√∂r√º sunar. Ayrƒ±ca herkese a√ßƒ±k adresini yapƒ±≈ütƒ±rarak ba≈üka bir c√ºzdanƒ± da i√ße aktarabilirsiniz.


Kripto ve NFT'ler


Kontrol panelinin kapsamlƒ± g√∂r√ºn√ºm√º, ister stabil kripto paralar, meme paralarƒ±, yerel blok zinciri token'leri gibi farklƒ± kripto varlƒ±klarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± ister NFT'lerinizi takip edebilmenize olanak saƒülar.

Koleksiyonunuzu g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek i√ßin bir NFT pazar yerine gitmek yerine bu sanat NFT'lerini, POAP'larƒ± ve daha fazlasƒ±nƒ± takdir etmek ve g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek i√ßin kolayca NFT'ler sekmesine ge√ßebilirsiniz. Kontrol paneli varsayƒ±lan olarak gizli ve ≈ü√ºpheli NFT'leri filtre dƒ±≈üƒ±nda bƒ±rakan temiz bir s√ºr√ºmd√ºr, b√∂ylece istenmeyen NFT'leri g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek zorunda kalmazsƒ±nƒ±z. Ayrƒ±ca sahip olduƒüunuz NFT'leri ve izlediƒüiniz diƒüer hesaplardan NFT'leri de ayƒ±rƒ±r. Ba≈ükalarƒ±nƒ±n koleksiyonlarƒ±nƒ± g√∂zetlediƒüiniz i√ßin kendinizi su√ßlu hissetmeyin; neticede her ≈üey zincirdedir.

Birden fazla zinciri toplama


T√ºm varlƒ±klarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± tek tek g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek i√ßin bireysel aƒülara ge√ßi≈ü yapmak yerine onlarƒ± aynƒ± anda g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek amacƒ±yla en fazla yedi aƒü se√ßebilirsiniz.

MetaMask Portfolio ≈üu anda en fazla yedi aƒüƒ± desteklemektedir:

Bakiyelerinizi g√∂r√ºnt√ºlemek istediƒüiniz t√ºm aƒülarƒ± se√ßin ve kontrol paneli se√ßiminize g√∂re varlƒ±klarƒ±nƒ±zƒ± pencerenizde g√∂stersin.

Zincirdeki aktivite


Aylar √∂nce yaptƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ±z spek√ºlatif ≈üeyleri hatƒ±rlamaya mƒ± √ßalƒ±≈üƒ±yorsunuz? Bunu anlƒ±yoruz. ƒ∞≈ülem takibi bu y√ºzden son derece faydalƒ±dƒ±r, b√∂ylece MetaMask Portfolio'dan ayrƒ±lmak zorunda kalmadan Kontrol Paneli dahilinde ‚Äúƒ∞≈ülemler‚Äù sekmesine ge√ßerek bu i√ßg√∂r√ºlere g√∂z atabilirsiniz.

MetaMask Portfolio, varsayƒ±lan olarak i≈ülemlerinizin temiz bir g√∂r√ºn√ºm√ºn√º verir, b√∂ylece etkile≈üimde bulunduƒüunuz token'ler ve NFT'ler hakkƒ±nda daha iyi bir fikir edinebilirsiniz. Bu da spam'i ortadan kaldƒ±rmaya yardƒ±mcƒ± olur ancak dilediƒüiniz zaman doƒürulanmamƒ±≈ü i≈ülemlerin g√∂sterilmesini se√ßebilirsiniz. Size rastgele sunulan bazƒ± ilgin√ß token'leri bulabilirsiniz!
(Yine de bunlarla etkile≈üimde bulunurken dikkatli olun.)

ƒ∞≈ülemler sekmesinde, Ethereum, Polygon, and Avalanche aƒülarƒ± ve yakƒ±nda eklenecek olan diƒüer aƒülar genelinde zincirdeki aktivitelerinizi g√∂r√ºnt√ºleyebilirsiniz.

Daha kolay organizasyon ve koruma i√ßin t√ºm i≈ülemlerinizin bir dosyasƒ±nƒ± da indirebilirsiniz. Bu durum vergi d√∂nemini de daha kolay hale getirebilir‚Ä¶

Tek pencere

Birden fazla merkeziyetsiz uygulamada gezinmek zorunda kalmadan birden fazla hesap ve aƒü genelindeki t√ºm kripto, NFT ve i≈ülemlerinizi bir araya getirerek c√ºzdan faaliyetlerinizin t√ºm√ºne tek bir pencerede derin bir bakƒ±≈ü elde edebilirsiniz.

nodes.title: MetaMask Extension‚Äôs updated UX elevates network, dapp, and account selection
nodes.subtitle: Learn about the wallet‚Äôs new look and how it provides a simpler web3 experience.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
We‚Äôre excited to unveil some changes to the MetaMask wallet extension with v10.33 that make it simpler, cleaner, and more intuitive to use than ever before.

You'll notice a crisper layout when you first open the fox head on your browser.

The two top rows which previously displayed wallet address, connection status, network selection, and account selection have now been condensed into a single top row, minimizing visual noise and giving you everything you need at a quick glance.

In addition, we've made site connections more obvious on the top right (check image below) so you can easily see and manage the dapps your MetaMask wallet is interacting with. This helps with granting permissions and knowing what you‚Äôre connecting to.

To avoid confusing elements‚Äîyes, we heard you and went to work‚Äîwe separated the account selection from the global menu navigation and placed the account avatar right by the account name so you always have a clear visual association with your identity. This seemingly minor change has profound implications by increasing your awareness and confidence when interacting with dapps.

Finally, the network selector moved to the top left within the header and each network is now associated with its respective token. This unique pairing helps distinguish different chains from each other and promotes user safety.

At MetaMask, we encourage safe and secure web3 habits. We hope this new user experience makes your web3 journey more simple and enjoyable. This UX was inspired by user feedback, and we encourage you to keep telling us what you think! We take note. Remember, MetaMask Portfolio spun out from popular community request. üòâ

Till next time‚Ä¶

Happy browsing! üåêü¶ä

nodes.title: MetaMask and PayPal, all you need to know about buying ETH
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask is the first web3 wallet to allow U.S. users to buy ETH easily with PayPal.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask‚Äôs buy crypto solution within the wallet makes purchasing Ethereum (ETH) and other currencies easy. Adding to the list of payment options, PayPal is available as a payment method for our users across the U.S. (excl. Hawaii).

MetaMask is the first web3 wallet to enable users to buy ETH using PayPal, a leader in the digital payment space. In addition to purchasing ETH directly, the integration also supports the transfer of ETH from PayPal to MetaMask, aiding in more self-custody adoption.



What is PayPal?


In addition to being one of the most popular digital payments providers, PayPal also offers cryptocurrency services on its platform. With this new integration, users will be able to use their PayPal balance, linked bank account, or debit card to add ETH to their MetaMask wallet directly.

How do I get started?


PayPal‚Äôs U.S. users can now buy ETH in a handful of clicks. You will be prompted to sign up with PayPal if you don‚Äôt currently have an account with them.

To add ETH to your MetaMask wallet with PayPal in the U.S.:

  1. Login into the MetaMask browser extension, mobile app, or MetaMask Portfolio. (If you haven‚Äôt downloaded MetaMask yet, start here).
  2. Click or tap ‚ÄúBUY‚Äù to get started.
  3. Select country (US only) and state (PayPal‚Äôs crypto services are available in 49 states; not in Hawaii).
  4. Choose ‚ÄúPayPal‚Äù as your payment method.
  5. Select ETH and enter the amount you want to buy (This is the only cryptocurrency currently available for purchase through PayPal on MetaMask).
  6. Sign in to your PayPal account.
  7. Select payment option of choice: PayPal balance, eligible bank, or debit card.
  8. Review purchase and click ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù.
  9. Success!!! ü¶ä Onto core web3 activities ü¶ä

It‚Äôs that simple. PayPal‚Äôs easy crypto purchasing solution allows you to enjoy your funds quickly, on the go. Ready to dive in?
